meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2524.

td.p: Elliot Shteir, an attorney from Somerville, New Jersey
Susan Schubert, a retired teacher from Phoenix, Arizona
Aaron Klein, a religious school director from Des Plaines, Illinois

tr.td: ZOOLOGY
SPORTS
AMERICANA
FOOD & DRINK
BRITISH HISTORY
ABBREVIATIONS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: This was a tough Final. Who are [*]? They took part in, Jackson, the Revolutionary War, the Creek War, the War of 1812 & the 1st Seminole War. Zachary Taylor, the War of 1812, the 2nd Seminole War, the Black Hawk War & the Mexican War.)
SusanWho was Grant?
$2,000
AaronWho was Grant
$2,000
ElliotWho was Grant?
$5,000
(1 of) Andrew Jackson or Zachary Taylor')

1 of 2 presidents who had military service in 4 wars
Aaron
Susan
Elliot
Aaron
Susan
Elliot
